text: Ne Omukhasi naria okhusukunwa nohomba Omusatsa wuwe okhukhaya okhumubukulamwo oluchendo, owo shinobubii okhukasia omulembe hakari wabu tawe, ne omulembe nomulayi, ne emioyo chialonjelwamwo obwimani nende obwikombi. Nenimukhola amalayi mana mwaria Nyasaye awo toto Nyasaye amanyile muno koosi kamukholanga
